overview: Trapped in her home, in a city under siege, Um Yazan - a mother of three - has turned her apartment into a safe haven for her family and neighbors, and tries to protect them from the war abroad. When bombs threaten to destroy a building, and when snipers turn squares into battle zones, then thieves break into the house to terrorize them, maintaining a balance inside the house becomes a matter of life and death.
title: فى سوريا
